name: Witch Hell
description:
Made this game alone :( for Bullet Hell Game Jam. 

How To Play :

  • Get shields to protect players from matching bullet colors by using 3 elements of the same color
  • Using element cost 1 orb
  • Gain orb by taking it on the ground after killing enemy
  • Survive as long as you can :D

Controls  :

  • Right click - Move Player by clicking the ground.
  • Left Click - Target enemy by clicking.
  • Q - Add blue element - increase attack range
  • W - Add green element - increase move speed
  • E - Add red element - increase attack damage
  • S - Stop movement.

Some asset used in this project :

  • explode effect - https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/pixel-mini-effect
  • portal - https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-portal-sprites
  • dungeon & character -  https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
  • pixel font - https://www.1001fonts.com/press-start-font.html#license
  • BulletFury demo.
